talk.author: did:plc:dyxl6sfow5r6zsf2rpmr553x
talk.utter:
and it was idw's biggest disney comics release when they still had the license, meaning english speakers easily can reach and read it

so yeah I'd accept that spectrus is just being set up to be relevant now

talk.author: did:plc:dyxl6sfow5r6zsf2rpmr553x
talk.utter: expect the editors at topolino to pick up on this and start pushing for paperinik vs spectrus stories

talk.author: did:plc:igdsycziambghcg7wughi6qv
talk.utter: See the thing is that, due to the restructuring of Topolino, currently most of the Paperinik stories are written by Gervasio, and he doesn't write Paperinik as a superhero parody anymore, but as a morally grey self-avenging guy kinda like he was in his first stories

talk.author: did:plc:dyxl6sfow5r6zsf2rpmr553x
talk.utter: hrrrm. I know there's been backlash to gervasio's stuff but I'll admit conceptually that doesn't sound bad to me
